reviewText: I could not get this movie on netflix but I found it on here.  I read the book and wanted to see the movie.  Came promptly. VHS in very good condition.

Like most books which are made into movies, things were changed from the original story.  However, I understand that this was done for for a reason.  Angela Lansbury was excellent as Penelope and her children played their roles much like the characters in the novel.  The scenes at Cornwall, or the likeness of, were beautiful and brought back my memories of the English coast.

This movie the Shell seekers is a great movie for the younger generation who thinks senior citizens should be treated like an egg. Angela Landsbury proves her family wrong and protects what is hers against her greedy son and daughter. Beware of the seniors! Great family movie!
